titleStmt.title: The rudiments of the Hebrew grammar in English Published for the benefit of some friends, who being ignorant of the Latine, are desirous to understand the Bible in the originall tongue. By Hanserd Knollys.
titleStmt.author: Knollys, Hanserd, 1599?-1691.

titleStmt.title: The rudiments of the Hebrew grammar in English Published for the benefit of some friends, who being ignorant of the Latine, are desirous to understand the Bible in the originall tongue. By Hanserd Knollys.
titleStmt.author: Knollys, Hanserd, 1599?-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Moses Bell, for William Larner at the Blackmore neere Bishopsgate, and George Whittington at the blew Anchor in Cornhill neer the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Another edition of the same year (Wing K724) has only Bell's initials in the imprint.
Imperfect as filmed; title page only of Harvard University Library copy on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
